strapiPost.title: Potential Plant Parents
strapiPost.content:
The 23rd annual Celebration of Trees is exactly one month out from today, Oct 23! 

  • Up with trees: In an effort to maintain the urban forest, Fayetteville Parks and Recreation staff and the City of Fayetteville Urban Advisory Board are hosting their once-a-year tree giveaway at the Spring Street Parking Garage starting at 7a until the trees are are gone. 
  • Right for you: Fayetteville residents are limited to 2 trees and must provide proof of residence. There are 11 species in this yearâ€™s line-up, many of which provide benefits for birds and pollinators. Check out the fact sheets about each species to know which would best fit your environment and lifestyle. 

For more information, click HERE.
